annualInvestmentAllowance.title: Annual investment allowance
annualInvestmentAllowance.description: Can be claimed on equipment bought (except cars) up to maximum annual amount. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99

otherCapitalAllowance.title: Other Capital allowance
otherCapitalAllowance.description: All other capital allowances. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99

businessPremisesRenovationAllowance.title: Other Capital allowance
businessPremisesRenovationAllowance.description: Allowance for renovation or conversion of derelict business properties. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99

propertyAllowance.title: Other Capital allowance
propertyAllowance.description: The limited amount Tax exemption for individuals with income from land or property. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99
